text: taM ~MyakShma# ArcCaqd-rAjA#naqM ~MyakShma# Araqditiq tad-rA#jayaqkShmasyaq janmaq yat pApI#yAqnaBa#vaqt tat pA#payaqkShmasyaq yajjAqyAByO&vi#ndaqt tajjAqyEnya#syaqya EqvamEqtEShAqM ~MyakShmA#NAqM janmaq vEdaq naina#mEqtE yakShmA# vindantiqsa EqtA Eqva na#maqsyannupA#dhAvaqt tA a#bruvaqn. vara#M ~MvRuNAmahai samAvaqcCa Eqva naq upA#yaq itiq tasmA# Eqta - [  ]  25
